prompt.content: Using NVDA’s 10-Ks, answer the following question: In FY2024, NVDA reported that one indirect customer represented 19% of total revenue for the fiscal year. This indirect customer purchased NVDA products through a specific direct customer for which NVDA provided additional disclosure. In FY2025, what percentage of NVDA’s total revenue was attributable to this direct customer?

messages.content: [{"criteria":"One indirect customer represented approximately 19% of NVDA’s total revenue in FY2024 and primarily purchased through \"Customer A\".","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Sales to Customer A represented 13% of NVDA’s FY2024 total revenue."},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"NVDA’s FY2025 Form 10-K shows Direct Customer A represented 12% of total revenue for FY2025."},{"criteria":"NVDA’s FY2025 Form 10-K shows Customer B represented 11% of total revenue for FY2025.","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"NVDA’s FY2025 Form 10-K shows Customer C represented 11% of total revenue for FY2025."},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Customer A represented less than 10% of total revenue in FY2024 (as claimed in the answer)."},{"criteria":"Customer C represented less than 10% of total revenue in FY2024 (as claimed in the answer).","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Customer B represented 13% of total revenues in FY2024 (as stated in the answer)."},{"criteria":"The answer concludes that the FY2024 \"Customer A\" corresponds to the FY2025 \"Customer B.\"","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Final Answer: 11% (percentage of NVDA’s total revenue in FY2025 attributable to the direct customer identified).","operator":"correctness"}]
